outputs.output_descr: The present project intends to play a critical and complementary role to this ongoing national process, by providing a replicable demonstration model where several of the key priorities of the reform process will be implemented and showcased.  The primary objective of the proposed project is hence to develop a replicable model of how multiple protected areas working within an ecologically interconnected and interdependent biodiversity corridor area can jointly achieve conservation and sustainable development objectives, thereby catalyzing the sustainability of Belize's national protected area system.

project_descr: Integrating Protected Areas and Landscape Management in the Golden Stream Watershed
